fu.tjk.databaseAction

Class DBCon

  • java.lang.Object
    • fu.tjk.databaseAction.DBCon

  • public class DBCon
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used for communication with the database.

    • Method Detail

      • createConncetion

        public void createConncetion()
        Connection to database. Call this method before you execute query.

      • searchInDB

        public java.sql.ResultSet searchInDB(java.lang.String sqlquery)
        This method executes a sqlquery on the database. Throws an exception if the query is wrong.
        Parameters:
        sqlquery - The query to execute.
        Returns:
        A ResultSet with the data. Can be null.

      • closeConnection

        public void closeConnection()
        Closes the connection to the database. Call this method after you finished.
